channels.summary: Light conversation about a past client where management was poor; no concrete SEO tactics, tools, or resources shared.
Announcement of a research-backed playbook for rapidly increasing brand visibility in AI responses, plus brief community orientation guidance.

highlights.title: Playbook to grow brand visibility from 0% to 20% in 2 weeks using AI prompt analysis
highlights.details: Michael shares a signup form for a session where he will explain a tested playbook based on millions of prompt responses across 1000+ brands. The session will cover how to increase brand visibility in AI outputs using free tools, and how the Spotlight tool can automate this process.

channels.summary: Discussion about building AI content creator agents, tools for automating workflows, and a new CMS/AI content creator project integrating Claude Code.

highlights.title: Openclaw for AI automation
highlights.details: Members discuss Openclaw as an emerging tool for building AI-powered workflows. Jon notes that onboarding and setup are improving quickly, while others say it's promising but still early and needs refinement.

highlights.title: No-code/low-code AI workflows with n8n, Make, and Claude Code
highlights.details: Suggestion to implement an AI content creator agent by orchestrating tools like n8n or Make, or by building an agentic workflow in Claude Code. This is framed as a path for less-technical builders to create AI systems that post content and manage audience engagement.

highlights.title: AI content creator agents as replacements for niche influencers
highlights.details: 03Toyoda describes an "AI content creator" as an agent that creates posts and videos for social media and builds a tribal following. In their niche, they feel many human creators could be replaced by such agents and even consider running a Turing test to prove the point.

highlights.title: CMS + Claude Code AI content creator project
highlights.details: Alan is working on a CMS/AI content creator system that integrates a CMS app with Claude Code to generate content, although itâ€™s not yet ready to share publicly.
